casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellant, v. Axson, Appellee.

[Cite as State v. Axson, 104 Ohio St.3d 248, 2004-Ohio-6396.]

(No. 2003-1025 Submitted October 13, 2004 Decided December 8, 2004.)

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed and the cause is remanded to the trial court for resentencing consistent with State v. Jordan, 104 Ohio St.3d 21, 2004-Ohio-6085, 817 N.E.2d 864.

Moyer, C.J., Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor and O’Donnell, JJ., concur. *249William D. Mason, Cuyahoga County Prosecuting Attorney, and Francine B. Goldberg, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellant. David H. Bodiker, State Public Defender, and Stephen P. Hardwick, Assistant Public Defender, for appellee.
